entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is watching Mundungus grab objects from the ground. He asks if Mundungus is selling this stuff.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a person who is grabbing an assortment of grubby-looking objects from the ground. Harry accuses him of stealing from Sirius's house.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who picks up something silver and recognizes it as familiar.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who squeals Harry's name when she sees him holding Mundungus against the wall.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person whose house was robbed by Mundungus. The Black family crest on an object taken from his house is mentioned.

relationships.description: Harry accuses Mundungus of stealing from Sirius's house.
Ron picks up the goblet and recognizes it as familiar.
